related_questions.question: What is a SOLIDWORKS var?
related_questions.snippet: A SOLIDWORKS Reseller Partner, also known as a Value-Added Reseller (VAR), is an independent business that sells and supports SOLIDWORKS design and product development software. SOLIDWORKS resellers work directly with customers to help them implement, optimize, and get the most value out of their purchase.
